explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the scene, indicating that the theatre represents the Palace of the Ocean and Thetis, accompanied by Rivers, Streams, Fountains, Brooks, etc. This fits the definition of the 'setting' category.
stgdir: Le théâtre représente le Palais de l'Ocean, et de Thétis, qui y sont accompagnez des Fleuves, des Rivières, des Fontaines, des Ruisseaux, etc.
